recipesJson.name: Mother of God's Milk
recipesJson.author: ID10-T
recipesJson.description: If you've ever wondered what sweet baby Jesus tasted when he breastfed, this is the recipe for you. A bright, clean, dragon-berry milk, kind of like a Creamsaver that doesn't exist but definitely should. Inspired by God Milk by @SkiddlzNinja and my own Mother of Dragons' Milk recipes, but better than either of those after a one-week steep.

reviews.text: I had a bit of a Different view when we reviewed this one on thefogvlog (first Rule podcast), But I am now 100% convinced and definitely agree that this is better than Mother of Dragons Milk, Especially after about day 10 of steeping. Well done and Epic job ID10-T, This is another BANGER!!!

This fades quit a bit over time vaped about 30 mls after a 10 or so day steep. Vaped the remainer today after a month, and all the lovely strawberry I was getting as toned down, but overall it is still good. This is also an older recipe and i am sure if you redid it there would be things you would do definitely today. The creaminess IMO is on point its simple and gets the job done. The dragonfruit is also used very well it shines through and plays well the strawberry. If that TPA strawberry didn’t fade and develop a strange “green” like note as it steeped this would be the perfect SB & cream

Lots of stems and plastic taste for "Strawberry Mutes/Non Tasters" after a month, yet still strangely yummy. The feeling (not the taste) is like licking the smelly marker at school and kind of getting off on the taste so you keep going back for more.  The TPA Bavarian Cream really softens up after a month.
It's one of the only recipes I can taste strawberry in. But only the first pull or so.  Great to keep on standby so I can enjoy the stuff.  My bottle has been sitting for over a month and the smoothness of the cream is stellar.
This stuff is like crack, can't put it down!  Very quickly became an ADV, thank you so much for sharing the recipe.
Great stuff, can taste the strawberry very well with the dragonfruit mixed in. Definitely a bright s&c that has a good cream base to it.
This def IS better than the 2 which inspired this mash-up. Great work!

Within 1 day of steeping, this has easily became my favorite Dragonfruit based recipe. The strawberries used add complexity to the dragonfruit, while the vanilla swirl and the bav cream do something I can't even begin to explain, imparting a thick, delicious creaminess that is wonderfully balanced with the fruit  elements.
Finally!  A dragonfruit vape that I like. At first it was a little harsh however after 10+ days it's magical.
Delicious as Shake'n'Vape.  Now after a few days I could bathe in this.  Thanks mate!
